sentence.Network_en: Thracian tomb reflects the fundamental structural principles of Thracian cult buildings.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座公元前3世纪的色雷斯人古墓体现了色雷斯人宗教建筑的基本结构特点.

list.abs: 斯巴达克是色雷斯人，色雷斯人(Thracians)麇集于巴尔干半岛东部一带,是活跃在古代欧洲世界的一个人口繁多的混合型民族集团,据历 …

means.word_mean: 1. a Thraco-Phrygian language spoken by the ancient people of Thrace but extinct by the early Middle Ages

auth_sentence.content: Kitov compared the previously little-known Thracian civilization to that of ancient Greece.

auth_sentence.content: Even fairly provincial Thracian cities such as Xanthi, Komotini and Alexandroupoli offer a piece of the action.
